name: @sidharthchh/urlb64touint8array
description: A javscript utility function which converts the base 64 safe encoded string to UInt8Array. Originally written at https://github.com/gbhasha/base64-to-uint8array
keywords: base64, array, base, convert, uint8, url, uint8array
author: Sidharth Chhawchharia <sidharthchh@gmail.com>
